mapper.select: SELECT CONCAT(EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"), "(",EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"/value[@lang='en_US']"),")") AS name FROM sys_country WHERE id=1
SELECT id , CONCAT(EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"), "(",EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"/value[@lang='en_US']"),")") AS name FROM sys_country ORDER BY id
SELECT id,EXTRACTVALUE(name,"//value[@lang='zh_CN']") AS name FROM sys_province WHERE parentid=#{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id
SELECT id,EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"//value[@lang='zh_CN']") AS name FROM sys_city WHERE parentid=#{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id
SELECT id,EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"//value[@lang='zh_CN']") AS name FROM sys_district WHERE parentid=#{parentid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY id

SELECT id AS countryid,NULL provinceid,NULL AS cityid,NULL AS districtid, EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']") AS addr FROM sys_country WHERE INSTR(EXTRACTVALUE(fullname,"/value"),#{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) UNION SELECT sys_province.parentid,sys_province.id,NULL,NULL, CONCAT(EXTRACTVALUE(sys_country.fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"),"-", EXTRACTVALUE(sys_province.name,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']")) AS addr FROM sys_country,sys_province WHERE INSTR(EXTRACTVALUE(sys_province.NAME,"/value"),#{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND sys_country.id = sys_province.parentid UNION SELECT sys_province.parentid AS conntryid ,sys_city.parentid AS provinceid,sys_city.id AS cityid,NULL, CONCAT(EXTRACTVALUE(sys_country.fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"),"-", EXTRACTVALUE(sys_province.name,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"),"-", EXTRACTVALUE(sys_city.fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']")) AS addr FROM sys_country,sys_province,sys_city WHERE INSTR(EXTRACTVALUE(sys_city.fullname,"/value"),#{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND sys_country.id = sys_province.parentid AND sys_city.parentid = sys_province.id UNION SELECT sys_province.parentid AS conntryid ,sys_province.id AS provinceid,sys_city.id AS cityid,sys_district.id AS districtid, CONCAT(EXTRACTVALUE(sys_country.fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"),"-", EXTRACTVALUE(sys_province.name,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"),"-", EXTRACTVALUE(sys_city.fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']"),"-", EXTRACTVALUE(sys_district.fullname,"/value[@lang='zh_CN']")) AS addr FROM sys_country,sys_province,sys_city,sys_district WHERE INSTR(EXTRACTVALUE(sys_district.fullname,"/value"),#{keywords,jdbcType=VARCHAR}) AND sys_district.parentid = sys_city.id AND sys_country.id = sys_province.parentid AND sys_city.parentid = sys_province.id
